nodes.text: Ry Ki Sakka was a human Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. Sakka replaced Master Jora Malli on the Jedi High Council after her death at the Battle of Kur.
Ry Ki Sakka was created for the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative, being introduced in the fourth episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show on July 28, 2021.
